title: Slide rule: percentage, proportion, squares and square roots
creator_credit: F.E. Brooker and Loucks and Norling Studios
brief_description: Using a rule with only “C” and “D” scales, multiplication and division operations are revised. Problems in proportion are solved, using both left and right index. Problems in percentage solved using the proportion method. Use of the rule with “A”, “B”, “C” and “D” scales. Procedures for determining squares and square roots are demonstrated.
